title: They came to Wales
creator_credit: James Ritchie, Edgar H. Anstey, British Transport Films and Barry Clayton
brief_description: This kaleidoscopic film shows the new industrial Wales of nuclear power and electronics, of jet aircraft and optical glass developing in the older Wales of mountain, seascape and good company. We meet people who came to Wales from abroad and have found a new industrial and social life there.
creator_credit_for_label: James Ritchie, Edgar H. Anstey, British Transport Films and Barry Clayton
